query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.mainIsSuccess='101051301' and est.endtime>=to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.endtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.mainProductCode,est.endtime from est_businessoperation est where (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.mainIsSuccess='101051301' and est.endtime>=to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.endtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') order by est.endtime desc

query-define.name: query2
query-define.where: (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.mainIsSuccess='101051301' and est.mainproductcode in ( select est_plan.mainproductcode from est_businessplan est_plan ) and est.mainproductcode in ( select est_pilot.mainproductcode from est_businesspilot est_pilot ) and est.endtime>=to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.endtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.mainProductCode,est.endtime from est_businessoperation est where (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.mainIsSuccess='101051301' and est.mainproductcode in ( select est_plan.mainproductcode from est_businessplan est_plan ) and est.mainproductcode in ( select est_pilot.mainproductcode from est_businesspilot est_pilot ) and est.endtime>=to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.endtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') order by est.endtime desc

select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.mainProductCode,est.endtime from est_businessoperation est where est.mainid not in (select distinct est.mainid from est_businessoperation est where (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.mainIsSuccess='101051301' and est.mainproductcode in ( select est_plan.mainproductcode from est_businessplan est_plan ) and est.mainproductcode in ( select est_pilot.mainproductcode from est_businesspilot est_pilot ) ) and est.mainIsSuccess='101051301' and est.endtime>=to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.endtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') order by est.endtime desc
